query:
SELECT 
            id, 
            COALESCE(name, email) as "name!",
            email,
            avatar_url
        FROM users 
        WHERE id != $1 
          AND is_active = true
          AND (
            email ILIKE '%' || $2 || '%' 
            OR name ILIKE '%' || $2 || '%'
          )
        ORDER BY 
            CASE WHEN email ILIKE $2 || '%' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
            created_at DESC
        LIMIT 20
